channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why this retirement company’s CEO is a huge supporter of private equity in your 401(k)
item.description: The train has already left the station, says Empower’s Ed Murphy.

item.title: I don’t want to pay the new $895 American Express Platinum fee — but will canceling the card hurt my credit score?
item.description: If you tell Amex you’re considering canceling, the company might offer you some cash, points or miles as an incentive to keep your card.

item.title: As Buffett nears retirement, he’s making his biggest purchase in years
item.description: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway says it is acquiring a “robust portfolio of operating assets,” in Occidental’s OxyChem.

item.title: Government shutdown means Fed lacks crucial data as it considers rate cuts
item.description: It’s a bad time for the data to disappear.

item.title: Tesla delivers a big sales beat, and the end of EV tax credits may not be the only reason
item.description: Tesla reported third-quarter deliveries that topped the highest analyst estimate, but the stock pulled back.

item.title: A health-care stock that's maintaining momentum despite regulatory headwinds
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: Dragonfly Energy Rockets 17% on Nevada Tech Hub Funding Win: A Battery Stock That’s Suddenly Buzzing
item.description: Folks, if you’re glued to the markets this morning like I am, you’ve probably spotted Dragonfly Energy Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: DFLI) lighting up the b...

item.title: Canaccord downgrades Lithium Americas to sell after Trump takes equity stake
item.description: Lithium Americas rally on the Trump administration equity stake is overdone, according to Canaccord Genuity.

item.title: Nike gets an upgrade from KeyBanc as turnaround materializes
item.description: Nike’s latest quarterly report showed the company is righting its ship, according to KeyBanc.

item.title: JPMorgan doubles the price target for this booming clean energy stock
item.description: Bloom Energy shares have gained about 300% this year as its onsite power generation systems are in high demand from data center customers.

item.title: A buying opportunity has emerged in this agriculture stock, JPMorgan says
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Zekauskas upgraded Corteva to overweight from neutral, saying the agricultural stock is undervalued after Wednesday's drawdown.

item.title: Canaan Inc. Lands Monster U.S. Order for Bitcoin Mining Gear – Why This Could Spark a Wild Ride in Crypto Stocks!
item.description: Folks, buckle up because the market’s throwing us a curveball this morning that’s got one little-known stock name lighting up like the Fourth of July....
